bio: When people think of Yo-criminals, they think of Doppelnyan. He’s the king of petty crimes, and has a rivalry with Detective Holdit.

soultimate.name: Dirty Claws
soultimate.description: Hit foe with a barrage of hits for lots of damage.

skill.effect: Increases damage to foes in danger.
skill.name: Knockout Blow

name: Doppelnyan
